item.title: JSS'21
item.description: A Deductive Reasoning Approach for Database Applications using Verification Conditions I. Alam, R. Halder, and J. S. Pinto. Journal of Systems and Software, 175:110903, 2021. Elsevier RepositoriUM Springer This paper proposes a comprehensive set of Verification Conditions (VCs) generation techniques from database programs, adapting Symbolic Execution, Conditional Normal Form, and Weakest Precondition. The validity checking of the generated VCs for a database program determines its correctness w.r.t. the annotated database properties.
